data.description: Display described data in a nice format
data.communities: Talked with Tim Bunce a while ago
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module displays the data described by Data::Describe module.
    It provides interface for dynamically changing display formats and
    number of sampled or selected records to be displayed. It is also
    prepared HTML codes to be used for a browser.
